job.title: Advanced Excel Developer
job.description:
Job Title: Advanced Excel Developer

Position Overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Advanced Excel Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in developing advanced Excel solutions, with expertise in building macros and applications integrated within Excel using VBA, C#, and .Net to continuously improve a homegrown solution that is heavily relied on by real-estate appraisers. The successful candidate will be crucial in enhancing our workflow solutions, data and analysis capabilities, automating complex tasks, and improving overall efficiency.

Responsibilities:
• Excel Solution Development:
• Design, develop, and implement advanced Excel solutions to meet business requirements.
• Create and optimize macros, scripts, and applications within Excel using VBA, C#, and .Net.
• Automation and Integration:
• Streamline and automate manual processes to improve productivity.
• Integrate Excel with external systems and databases for seamless data flow.
• Data Analysis and Reporting:
• Collaborate with stakeholders to understand data analysis needs and develop customized reports and dashboards.
• Implement advanced data analysis techniques to derive actionable insights.
• Troubleshooting and Debugging:
• Identify and resolve issues related to Excel applications, macros, and integrations.
• Perform debugging and testing to ensure the reliability and accuracy of developed solutions.
• Documentation:
• Maintain comprehensive documentation for all developed solutions, including code, processes, and user guides.
• Training and Support:
• Provide training and support to end-users on utilizing Excel-based tools and applications.
• Collaborate with other teams to ensure smooth adoption of developed solutions.
• Innovative Thinking:
• Demonstrate a proactive and innovative approach to problem-solving and solution development.
• Ability to think creatively and propose novel ideas to enhance Excel-based processes.
• Challenge the Status Quo:
• Exhibit a willingness to challenge existing practices and explore new, more efficient solutions.
• Drive continuous improvement by identifying opportunities for innovation and optimization.
• Effective Communication:
• Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
• Foster open communication and collaboration within the team and with business users.
• Adaptability:
• Thrive in a dynamic work environment and demonstrate adaptability to changing project requirements.
• Openness to learning new technologies and methodologies to stay at the forefront of Excel development best practices.
• Interpersonal Skills:
• Ability to work effectively with strong personalities and diverse teams.
• Navigate through challenging situations with diplomacy and tact.
• Client-Focused Collaboration:
• Work closely with business users to understand their needs and tailor solutions to meet specific requirements.
• Build and maintain positive working relationships with stakeholders at all levels.
• Problem-Solving and Decision-Making:
• Exhibit strong problem-solving skills, making sound decisions based on data and analysis.
• Comfortable navigating ambiguity and making decisions in the best interest of project goals.
• Time Management and Prioritization:
• Effectively manage multiple tasks and priorities to meet project deadlines.
• Ability to balance short-term and long-term objectives efficiently.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
• Proven experience as an Advanced Excel Developer, with a minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience.
• Strong proficiency in VBA, C#, .Net, and other relevant programming languages.
• In-depth knowledge of Excel functions, formulas, and data manipulation techniques.
• Experience in designing and implementing complex macros, applications, and integrations within Excel.
• Solid understanding of data analysis and reporting principles.
• Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
• Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Commercial Real Estate experience is a plus, preferably in Valuation / Property appraisals.
• Experience with SQL for database queries and manipulation.
• Familiarity with business intelligence tools.
• Knowledge of version control systems.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for an experienced Advanced Excel Developer to join our team for a project lasting 3 to 6 months. As an Excel Developer, you will be responsible for developing advanced Excel solutions, creating complex formulas and macros, and designing and implementing data analysis tools.

The ideal candidate should have a strong background in API integration, data analysis, Python, SQL, and data visualization tools such as Microsoft Power BI. You should also have experience in creating interactive dashboards and conducting operations analytics.

To be considered for this role, please submit a proposal outlining how you can assist with this project. Additionally, please include links to past completed projects that showcase your Excel development skills and your ability to create data analysis tools and visualizations.

We look forward to reviewing your proposal and discussing this exciting opportunity further.
